ops_unv_tmplt.name: Jenkins
ops_unv_tmplt.description: Control Jenkins operation from universal controller
ops_unv_tmplt.script_unix:
#!/usr/bin/python3 #/opt/universal/python3.6/bin/python3 ########################################################### # Name: Jenkins_UT.py # # Purpose: # 1. Trigger Jenkins build # 2. Get last build info # 3. Set next build number # 4. Enable/Disable Job # 5. Enable/Disable Node # 6. Delete Build # 7. Create new Jenkins Job # 8. Copy/Rename a Jenkins Job # 9. list running build # # Prerequisites: # - Universal Agent for Windows/Linux # - Python 3 # - Requires the Python modules # - datetime, jenkins, sys # - Note: module can be added using pip # - e.g. use: pip install Jenkins # # Version History: # 0.1 Ravi Murugesan 2020-06-2020 Initial Version #################################################### version = "0.1"
# Used modules
import re import glob import sys, os import datetime, time import logging import jenkins import argparse
# -- loglevel settings INFO,DEBUG, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL
logging.basicConfig(level=logging.INFO, format=' %(asctime)s - %(levelname)s - %(message)s')
def main(): Set_Variables() # -- Set Variables from Universal Task Form or Command Line Input if args.jenkins_function == "get_build_info": get_build_info() elif args.jenkins_function == "copy_job": copy_job() elif args.jenkins_function == "rename_job": rename_job() elif args.jenkins_function == "get_last_build_number": get_last_build_number() elif args.jenkins_function == "update_next_build_number": update_next_build_number() elif args.jenkins_function == "start_build": start_build() elif args.jenkins_function == "list_running_builds": list_running_builds() elif args.jenkins_function == "delete_job": delete_job() elif args.jenkins_function == "enable_node": enable_node() elif args.jenkins_function == "disable_node": disable_node() elif args.jenkins_function == "enable_job": enable_job() elif args.jenkins_function == "disable_job": disable_job() elif args.jenkins_function == "create_new_job": create_new_job() elif args.jenkins_function == "get_output_build": get_output_build() elif args.jenkins_function == "get_plugins": get_plugins() elif args.jenkins_function == "install_plugin": install_plugin() # -- def Set_Variables(): parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description='Purpose : Execute a Jenkins function') # ## --> Jenkins Connection Settings: parser.add_argument("--jenkins_credentials_user", default="${_credentialUser('${ops_ci_jenkins_credentials}')}") parser.add_argument("--jenkins_credentials_password", default="${_credentialPwd('${ops_ci_jenkins_credentials}')}")
# ## -->Jenkins Universal Task Settings parser.add_argument("--jenkins_url", default="${ops_ci_jenkins_url}") parser.add_argument("--jenkins_function", default="${ops_ci_jenkins_function}") parser.add_argument("--jenkins_jobname", default="${ops_ci_jenkins_jobname}") parser.add_argument("--job_token", default="${ops_ci_job_token}") parser.add_argument("--job_inp_parm", default="${ops_ci_job_inp_parm}") parser.add_argument("--config_file_text", default="${ops_ci_config_file_text}") parser.add_argument("--rename_job", default="${ops_ci_rename_job}") parser.add_argument("--from_job", default="${ops_ci_from_job}") parser.add_argument("--to_job", default="${ops_ci_to_job}") parser.add_argument("--enable_node", default="${ops_ci_enable_node}") parser.add_argument("--disable_node", default="${ops_ci_disable_node}") parser.add_argument("--delete_job", default="${ops_ci_delete_job}") parser.add_argument("--next_build_number", default="${ops_ci_next_build_number}") parser.add_argument("--enable_job", default="${ops_ci_enable_job}") parser.add_argument("--disable_job", default="${ops_ci_disable_job}") parser.add_argument("--build_number", default="${ops_ci_build_number}") parser.add_argument("--timeout", default="${ops_ci_timeout}") parser.add_argument("--plugin_name", default="${ops_ci_plugin_name}") ###########Set the default timeout to 10 seconds if not specified in the input####################### # ## -- global args args = parser.parse_args() # -- Setup Logging logging.info("Executing version " + version + " with the following paramaters") logging.info(args) if not args.timeout: args.timeout="10" logging.info("Jenkins connection timeout default set to "+str(args.timeout)+"secs") else: logging.info("Jenkins connection timeout set to "+str(args.timeout)+"secs") # -- # -- ################################################################# # function to Install a Jenkins Plugin ################################################################# def install_plugin(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) logging.info("Plugin to be installed is :"+args.plugin_name) if not args.plugin_name: logging.error("Please provide a plugin name to install in jenkins Master") sys.exit(1) else: info=server.install_plugin(args.plugin_name) logging.info("Plugin Install Info: "+info) except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in Installing the plugin the plugins info "+info) logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ################################################################# # function to get the Jenkins plugin list ################################################################# def get_plugins(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) plugins_info=server.get_plugins_info() #logging.info("Installed Plugins in Master: "+str(plugins_info)) for plugin in plugins_info: plugin_name=plugin['longName'] plugin_version=plugin['version'] plugin_url=plugin['url'] print (plugin_name+"==>"+ plugin_version+"==>" +plugin_url) except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in getting the plugins info") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1)
################################################################# # function to get the Jenkins Build info ################################################################# def get_output_build(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) build_console_output=server.get_build_console_output(args.jenkins_jobname ,int(args.build_number)) logging.info("Build Console Output: "+build_console_output) except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in getting the build info") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ################################################################# # function to get the Jenkins Build info ################################################################# def get_build_info(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) build_info = server.get_build_info(args.jenkins_jobname ,int(args.build_number)) logging.info("Build for Job: "+args.jenkins_jobname+" Build Number:"+args.build_number+" :"+ str(build_info)) print ("Requested Build info Details:",build_info) except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in getting the build info") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ################################################################# # Get the last build Number for a Jenkin Job ################################################################# def get_last_build_number(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) last_build_number = server.get_job_info(args.jenkins_jobname)['lastCompletedBuild']['number'] logging.info("Last Completed Build for Job: "+args.jenkins_jobname+" is "+ str(last_build_number)) print("Last completed Build Number:",last_build_number) except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in getting the Last completed build info") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ################################################################# # Trigger a build in jenkins by starting a Jenkins Job ################################################################# def start_build(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) #Get Next Build Number before triggering the build next_build_number = server.get_job_info(args.jenkins_jobname)['nextBuildNumber'] logging.info("Next Build Number for Job: "+args.jenkins_jobname+" is :"+str(next_build_number)) get_queue_item=server.build_job(args.jenkins_jobname) time.sleep(10) ### Default setting the build indicator to False build_indicator=False build_info=server.get_build_info(args.jenkins_jobname ,next_build_number) build_indicator=build_info['building'] build_result=build_info['result'] print("Building Indicator:",build_info['building']) print("Build_info_ID:",build_info['id']) print("Build_result_status: ",build_info['result']) try: while build_indicator: build_info=server.get_build_info(args.jenkins_jobname ,next_build_number) build_indicator=build_info['building'] build_result=build_info['result'] #print("build Result:",build_result) if build_indicator: #build is still in progress - poll after 10 seconds to check the build status time.sleep(10) else: #Build process is completed , Get the Build status print("Build finished with result: ",build_info['result']) break build_console_output=server.get_build_console_output(args.jenkins_jobname ,next_build_number) if(build_result != "SUCCESS"): logging.info("Build Finished with status :"+build_result) logging.error("Build Console Output: "+build_console_output) sys.exit(1) else: logging.info("Build Finished with status :"+build_result) logging.info("Build Console Output: "+build_console_output) except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in Getting the Build results") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in starting Jenkins Build") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ####################################################################### # Function to perform the Jenkins job copy ####################################################################### def copy_job(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) server.copy_job(args.from_job,args.to_job) logging.info(args.from_job+" successfully copied to a new Job :"+args.to_job) except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in copying the existing job to New Job") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ####################################################################### # Function to perform the Jenkins job Rename ####################################################################### def rename_job(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) server.rename_job(args.rename_job,args.to_job) logging.info(args.rename_job +" Renamed as :"+args.to_job) except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in Renaming the job") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ####################################################################### # Function to enable a jenkins Job ####################################################################### def enable_job(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) server.enable_job(args.enable_job) logging.info("#########################################") logging.info(args.enable_job +" is enabled") logging.info("#########################################") except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in enabling the Job:"+args.jenkins_jobname) logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ####################################################################### # Function to disable a jenkins Job ####################################################################### def disable_job(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) server.disable_job(args.disable_job) logging.info("#########################################") logging.info(args.disable_job +" is disabled") logging.info("#########################################") except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in disablig the job") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ####################################################################### # Function to enable a jenkins Node ####################################################################### def enable_node(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) server.enable_node(args.enable_node) logging.info("#########################################") logging.info(args.enable_node +" is enabled") logging.info("#########################################") except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in enabling the Jenkins Node") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ####################################################################### # Function to disable a jenkins Node ####################################################################### def disable_node(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) server.disable_node(args.disable_node) logging.info("#########################################") logging.info(args.disable_node +" is disabled") logging.info("#########################################") except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in disabling the Jenkins Node") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ###################################################################### # Function to see the list of building that are running ###################################################################### def list_running_builds(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) running_builds=server.get_running_builds() logging.info("#########################################") logging.info("##running Builds: ##"+str(running_builds)) logging.info("#########################################") except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in Getting the Running build info") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ######################################################################### # Function to set the next build number for Jenkins job ######################################################################### def update_next_build_number(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) last_build = server.get_job_info(args.jenkins_jobname)['lastCompletedBuild']['number'] next_build=last_build+int(args.next_build_number) logging.info("Last Completed build :"+str(last_build)+" New Build number is: "+str(next_build)) server.set_next_build_number(args.jenkins_jobname, last_build + int(args.next_build_number)) logging.info("#####################################################################") logging.info("## Next Build Number for Job: "+args.jenkins_jobname+"is :"+next_build) logging.info("######################################################################") except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in setting the Next build number") logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ########################################################################### # Function to delete a build that was executed before ########################################################################### def delete_job(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) logging.info("#############Initiating delete build function############################") server.delete_job(args.delete_job) logging.info("#########################################################################") logging.info("## Job: "+args.delete_job+" is deleted permanently") logging.info("######################################################################") except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in Deleting the job: "+args.delete_job) logging.error(e) sys.exit(1) ############################################################################# # Function to create a New Jenkins Job ############################################################################ def create_new_job(): try: server = jenkins.Jenkins(args.jenkins_url, username=args.jenkins_credentials_user, password=args.jenkins_credentials_password,timeout=int(args.timeout)) user = server.get_whoami() version = server.get_version() logging.info('Jenkins Version: %s Username: %s' %(version,user['fullName'])) logging.info("#############Initiating Jenkins Job Creation ############################") print("script to execute: ",args.config_file_text) script = open(r'''${_scriptPath('${ops_ci_config_file_text}')}''', 'r') script_data = script.read() server.create_job(args.jenkins_jobname,script_data) logging.info("*****"+args.jenkins_jobname+" Created Successfully") except Exception as e: logging.error("Error in creating the job: "+args.jenkins_jobname) logging.error(e) sys.exit(1)
# -- Execute main()

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Enable Node
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: specify the node that needs to be enabled
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: enable_node

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Next Build Number(+ Last Build Number)
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: should be greater than the last builder otherwise jenkins will ignore the request
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: next_build_number

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Rename Job
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: specify the job name that needs to be renamed
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: rename_job

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Jenkins Build Number
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Jenkins build number for the job(int)
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: build_number

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Jenkins-Function
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: select a function that needs to be executed in jenkins
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: jenkins_function

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Enable Job
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Specify the job name that needs to be enabled
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: enable_job

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Disable Job
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: specify the job that needs to be disabled
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: disable_job

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Jenkins URL
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Provide the Jenkins Host URL e.g: http://localhost:8080
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: jenkins_url

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: To JobName
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: copy/rename to a new Job Name eg: demo_job or folder/demo_job
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: to_job

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Jenkins Connection Timeout(in secs)
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Specify the connection time out interval in seconds
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: timeout

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Authentication Token -Jenkin Job
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Provide the Authentication token the for the Jenkin Job
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: job_token

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Jenkins Plugin Name
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Provide the Jenkin Plugin short name to be installed
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: plugin_name

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: Delete Job
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: Specify that needs to be deleted in Jenkins
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: delete_job

ops_unv_tmplt_field.label: From JobName
ops_unv_tmplt_field.hint: give the existing from where its needs to be copied eg: demo_job or folder/demo_job
ops_unv_tmplt_field.name: from_job

ops_unv_tmplt_field_choice.field_value_label: Get console Output for a Build
